fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
When visiting a player, you "collect" information about them during that night. This collection includes what they appear as during that night, and who visited them during that night. You do not learn the contents of your collection.
When a Town Investigative visits you during the night, their previous night's info gets added to your collection.
During the day, people may vote to squeeze you. If this vote passes, all of your collection gets revealed publicly, and you gain Basic defense. You can no longer add information to your collection, and you can no longer visit players. This vote does not end the day, and an elimination vote can still happen.
